skills.skill: .NET WCF and Web Api RESTful web services

duties_responsibilities.duty: Work on questions and bugs reported by users for homegrown web applications
Develop functional and non-functional requirements for .NET applications
Translate application storyboards and use cases into functional applications
Write clean, scalable code using .NET programming languages
Review and develop necessary API scripts for related enhancements
Perform integration and system testing of all developed modules

education_certification.credential: BS in Computer Science or relevant experience
